title: This One Bedroom Has All You Need! Available NOW!
posting_body: Under new ownership, we can now offer you a few well appointed one bedroom apartments to choose from in the very desirable area of Rincon Valley in Santa Rosa.
They have spacious and bright open floor plans with lots of fresh new features you're sure to enjoy in this small quaint community of sixteen units.
*Welcoming and warm tiled entry with hall coat closet
*Bright, open and functional living area, with either a downstairs patio or upper deck, some with views of the surrounding hillside valleys of Sonoma County.
*Bright full sized bathroom with modern fixtures
*Large carpeted bedroom with wall-to-wall closet space
*Located in the coveted Rincon Valley Unified School District, the highest ranking district in Santa Rosa, and recognized as one of the best in the State of California.
*A short distance to Oliver's Market and many other fine retailers in the exclusive Montecito Shopping Center.

*Convenient access to Hwy 12 and Interstate 101, only minutes to Howarth Park and Spring Lake, downtown Santa Rosa, Montgomery Village Shopping Center, Annadel State Park, as well as Calistoga, all in Sonoma Valley...everything that Sonoma County has to offer.
Rental Terms: Monthly and yearly terms available
*We NEVER charge you for application fees here!
Cats and dogs allowed with some breed and weight restrictions apply, along with management approval
*Pet deposit and monthly pet rent does apply
to schedule your own private showing of these available units, and we'll be happy to show you our community.
(Please do not email to this posting as it is not monitored by staff)
